name: Tank Command: RPG, Tanks Game
description:
Take an action on this new action-packed tactical RPG!

Tank Command game gives you a unique experience to challenge your skills and become a real tank commander!

Upgrade your vehicles, build up your own tanks squad for maximum power and join epic battles! Try your own tactics and battle with historical tanks in World War II inspired battlefields. Collect stars & rewards and destroy all enemies on your way!

NEW, 2019 RPG GAME
• Turn-based, tactical, tank RPG.
• More than 300 levels, each with a new challenge and strong opponents.
• 30+ iconic and unique 3D tanks from WW2. And more new tanks are coming!
• Battle across a variety of locations & destroy all enemy machines.

FAST TACTICAL BATTLES
• Use real armored 3D vehicles to battle.
• Plan position as a real tank commander and crash your enemies with force, powerful strikes and strategic decisions.
• Use unique skills and ultimate attacks to win.

UNLOCK & CUSTOMIZE TANKS
• Acquire secret blueprints and build your own large collection of 3D tanks.
• Upgrade the tanks you have.
• Build your own vehicles squad to destroy enemies.

CAMPAIGN
• Battle across a variety of locations & battlefields of WW2 Europe.
• Bolster your firepower with the loot you get.

Download the game now and make your own path to victory!

___________________________________________
